books.Title: Book Lovers
books.Author: Emily Henry
books.Description: An insightful, delightful, instant #1 New York Times bestseller from the author of Beach Read and People We Meet on Vacation.

books.Title: The Hag
books.Author: Marc Eliot
books.Description: Merle Haggard's story is a great American saga of a man who lifted himself out of poverty, oppression, loss and wanderlust, to catapult himself into the pantheon of American artists admired around the world
